name: Configarr
author: raydak-labs
description: Configarr is an open-source tool designed to simplify configuration and synchronization for Sonarr, Radarr, and other *arr applications. It integrates with TRaSH Guides to automate updates of custom formats, quality profiles, and other settings, while also supporting user-defined configurations. Features include compatibility with recyclarr templates, support for custom formats in different languages, and flexible deployment options.
